verses.roman:
tān vinirjitya samare
durmadān asurarṣabhān
pratilabdha-jaya-śrībhiḥ
putrair icchasy upāsitum

synonyms: tān—them; vinirjitya—defeating; samare—in the fight; durmadān—puffed up by strength; asura-ṛṣabhān—the leaders of the demons; pratilabdha—getting back; jaya—victory; śrībhiḥ—as well as the opulence; putraiḥ—with your sons; icchasi—you are desiring; upāsitum—to come together and worship Me.
translation: O Devī, O goddess, I can understand that you want to regain your sons and be together with them to worship Me, after defeating the enemies in battle and retrieving your abode and opulences.
